entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:54 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -11.2°C
Wind: NE 35 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow changing to periods of freezing drizzle or light snow mixed with ice pellets this morning. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this morning then becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Freezing drizzle or periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
